body.name: Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth, Native 1080P Bluetooth Projector,18000L Portable 4K Outdoor Movie Projector Compatible with iOS/Android/Laptop/HDMI/PC/ TV Stick
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 3 hrs 18 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 48 mins
features: 【Bluetooth 5.1 Function】The new projector Bluetooth 5.1 function allows you to easily connect to a variety of smart devices and enjoy a high-definition audio experience. With a simple one-button pairing, you can play your favorite music, movies and games smoothly. Bluetooth 5.1 technology is more stable and faster transmission speed, allowing you to enjoy the convenience and high quality of wireless audio.

【Native 1080P Full HD resolution】With a resolution of 1920*1080, a brightness of 18,000 lumens and a dynamic contrast ratio of 10,000:1, the projector has excellent color performance and clarity, allowing you to enjoy the stunning visual experience of high-definition images. The high-performance projection technology and advanced image processor will render detailed and lifelike colors, bringing every image to life.

【300’’ Giant Screen】This portable projector features 4:3/16:9 aspect ratio, 50%-100% zoom, provides 30-300 inches of projection display at a projection distance of 3.3-13.8 feet, and the focus adjustment projects a beautiful picture from any angle, so you can enjoy the visual feast of the super large screen.

【Multimedia Compatibility】With built-in HDMI, VGA, AV, USB, 3.5mm headphone ports, and the included AV and HDMI cables, this portable projector offers a wide range of multimedia compatibility and supports connectivity to a variety of smart devices including cell phones, tablets, laptops, TV sticks/boxes, game consoles, PCs, DVD players and USB flash drives.

【LIFETIME CUSTOMER SERVICE SUPPORT】Lifetime customer service support projector lamp life up to 50,000 hours, perfect for home entertainment, games, yoga and parties. Whether it's product use, troubleshooting or technical advice, our team of professionals is here to serve you. If you find any problems, please feel free to contact us through Amazon.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CROSEAU Native 1080P Bluetooth Projector This portable projector is equipped with 1080P Supported resolution and 18000 Lumens brightness, which delivers an image quality that is 3 times CLEARER than other mini projectors. Immerse yourself in breathtaking clarity and detail with our high-resolution projector. Designed to deliver stunning visuals, our projector boasts exceptional image quality, bringing every scene to life with vivid colors and sharp, precise details. Explore the full potential of your content and elevate your viewing experiences with our projector, designed to deliver superior image quality that exceeds expectations.

Enhance your visual experience with our exceptional projector Whether you're delivering a presentation, hosting a movie night, or showcasing your creative work, our projector ensures that every detail is displayed in stunning, true-to-life color. With its advanced technology and superior image quality, you can trust our projector to provide an immersive and captivating viewing experience for any occasion. Elevate your visuals and make an impact with our crystal-clear, high-definition projector.

Whether you're enjoying a movie night, delivering a presentation, or gaming, our projector's exceptional sound quality enhances every moment, ensuring an immersive and engaging audio-visual journey. Elevate your entertainment and communication with our projector's superior sound performance.

Whether you're enjoying a movie night, delivering a presentation, or gaming, our projector's generous screen size brings your content to life on a grand scale, captivating audiences and enhancing every visual moment. Transform any space into a captivating visual environment with our versatile projector Whether it's for professional presentations, immersive movie nights, or dynamic gaming experiences, our projector adapts seamlessly to various settings, delivering stunning visuals and exceptional performance. With its flexibility and adaptability, our projector is the perfect solution for a wide range of scenarios, ensuring that every visual experience is elevated to new heights. Elevate your entertainment, communication, and presentations with our projector, designed to shine in any setting.

Immerse yourself in a world of possibilities with our versatile projector Immerse yourself in a world of possibilities with our versatile projector, designed to adapt to various placement options. Whether you prefer ceiling mounting, tabletop setup, or rear projection, our projector offers flexibility to accommodate your preferred arrangement, ensuring optimal viewing angles and seamless integration into any space. Experience the freedom to customize your setup and elevate your visual experiences with our adaptable projector, designed to complement your unique needs and preferences.

Explore limitless connectivity options with our versatile projector Whether you prefer wireless, HDMI, USB, or other interfaces, our projector offers multiple connection options to suit your specific needs. From laptops and smartphones to gaming consoles and streaming devices, our projector ensures effortless compatibility, allowing you to share content from diverse sources with ease. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The native 1080P resolution delivers stunning clarity, and the 18000L brightness ensures vibrant visuals even in outdoor settings. Bluetooth connectivity is a convenient touch, making it compatible with various devices including PS5, smartphones, USB, HDMI, and AV. The portable design adds versatility, allowing for enjoyable movie nights anywhere. Impressed with the overall performance and versatility of this projector – a fantastic addition to my entertainment setup!Thank you for Amazon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Projection Experience!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this projector, and I must say I am extremely satisfied! It perfectly meets the needs of my home theater and delivers an unparalleled viewing experience. the projector's image quality is incredibly clear, with vibrant colors and sharp details. Whether watching movies, playing games, or presenting slideshows, it delivers stunning visual effects. the projector's brightness and contrast are outstanding. Even in well-lit environments, the picture remains clear and colors stay true, allowing me to enjoy high-quality imagery anytime.
